data.text: @krzyszto7wrobel It's the representatives of the member states’ governments (@EUCouncil) and the @Europarl_EN that adopt EU laws and policies, acting on our proposals. Learn more about the EU policy making process: https://t.co/mnl3sTxZh2 Best, The Social Media team (2/2)

@krzyszto7wrobel Dear @krzyszto7wrobel,
You may be surprised to learn that the entire European Commission civil service counts for around 32 000 staff – less than some European city councils (e.g. around 55,000 for Birmingham/50,000 for Paris). Detailed info: here https://t.co/JoCM3IGlhH (1/2)

We want to hear from you what works and what can be improved in the way EU laws affect your daily life. Thanks to the 'Lighten the Load' form you can share your experience and foster a change towards simplification and efficiency: https://t.co/Y4ExraoLaK 
#EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/IwLYhPrjkT

Save the date!
This week, we will continue rolling out our sectoral #EUBudget proposals:  
🙎‍♂️Tuesday #MigrationEU   
🛡️Wednesday #SecurityUnion
🌍Thursday #EUintheWorld https://t.co/kCbWKuUA1J

Solidarity is one of the key values in the European Union. 
For more information:
→ #EUSolidarityCorps press release https://t.co/IXC8PN91Ct 
→ Memo https://t.co/XX9KsD6Fb8 
→ Factsheets https://t.co/cBeOlmEnCB 
→ Follow @EuropeanYouth & @EU_Social https://t.co/IbrRHivJKt

Since the launch of the #EUSolidarityCorps in Dec 2016: 
💻 64,000 young people have registered
💼 5,000 young have started their placements in projects dealing with various topics (environment, culture, helping refugees or the elderly)
Visit https://t.co/PCKTetXlcf #EUandME https://t.co/d8lF9Q1lkg

We are proposing €1.26 billion to reinforce the #EUSolidarityCorps. This will allow at least 350,000 young Europeans to support communities in need between 2021 and 2027 through:
📌 Volunteering
📌 Traineeships 
📌 Job placements
Learn more → https://t.co/IXC8PN91Ct #EUBudget https://t.co/ePjyZKcVV7

"We are putting everything in place to enable the #EUSolidarityCorps to grow into a broad community of people and organisations ready to support those in need across our continent and beyond, helping to build resilient, cohesive societies." @TNavracsicsEU
 https://t.co/3wwFahT6ni

EU policies impact the lives of 500 million people and millions of companies. Give us your views on what matters most to you: your voice matters!
#EUHaveYourSay

We want to make the European Solidarity Corps as open and inclusive as possible and ensure that young people from all backgrounds can benefit.
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on the #EUSolidarityCorps https://t.co/ps5qhvQ2hh
📌 Check out the #TeamJunckerEU calendar for the week, including our #FutureofEurope debate with @MinPres in the #EPlenary → https://t.co/0xGDz2qaqL https://t.co/PerbHkE9JH

As an EU citizen, you have right to work (and to look for a job) in any other EU country ❤🇪🇺 #EUandME
https://t.co/XfUhsdRb9b https://t.co/4ARhME7GlL

#GDPR 🇪🇺 gives you control of your data. Because it's not as fun to look at the cat when you are the fish 🐱 🐟
How exactly? https://t.co/l7v5sqKQhC #EUandME #DataPrivacy https://t.co/SaF1rhaCzh

Are you ready to #DiscoverEU?
 We will allow around 15,000 young people to receive a travel pass for this summer.
Seize this chance and apply on Tuesday → https://t.co/PGV0HIDJt2 https://t.co/1HwrRXGjix

We continue to top global agri-food trade. 
With a trade value of €255 billion in 2017, the EU confirms for yet another year its position as largest global exporter and importer of agri-food products. 
Learn more → https://t.co/ptAAWlCe2P  #EUTrade https://t.co/MpGi0cRFsP

More than 150 million tonnes of plastics have accumulated in the world's ocean. Yet, billions of people depend on the ocean for livelihood, trade and prosperity. 
Together, we can reduce marine litter by 30% by 2020. #OurOcean https://t.co/3lgrHBGdlj

Thinking about proposing a European Citizens’ Initiative?
Get tips from experts and listen to the experiences of successful organisers!
Participate in our webinar and take the initiative→ https://t.co/BvneKLs5xH #EUTakeTheInitiative #ECI https://t.co/fj2f8cIcgl

data.text:
This week, we presented our #EUBudget proposals on 
💶 #investEU 
⚗ #HorizonEU & #SingleMarket
🚏 #CustomsUnion
In case you missed them, catch up with our Twitter moment → https://t.co/pKlwhB9xgR https://t.co/sogXVajjO5

Facilities for 700 more students and infrastructure fit for a forward looking university – EU investments at Portugal's Nova School of Business and Economics made this possible https://t.co/dzmv270dJX #investEU #DiaDePortugal https://t.co/sclWwOda4x

Get to know Portugal – the country celebrating its national day today!
The #FutureofEurope also includes Portugal. 
O futuro da Europa também passa por Portugal. 
#DiadePortugal https://t.co/Uj3uNKRW1L

Today, the Portuguese celebrate the Day of Portugal, Camões, and the Portuguese Communities.
The country has this unique cultural heritage, beauty and luminosity, where tradition and modernity blend together perfectly. 
Feliz #DiadePortugal! 🇵🇹 https://t.co/hdfgIUNwVS

When packing for a trip in the EU, don't forget your European Health Insurance Card! 
It gives you access to emergency medical treatment under the same conditions as for nationals anywhere in the EU! ❤🇪🇺 https://t.co/RixGOD2AEL #EUandME https://t.co/UgjUMjuIOX

We want to beat plastic pollution. 
And you, are you #ReadyToChange?
As part of our #PlasticsStrategy, we invite you to join our effort to reduce single-use plastics and help make our oceans and nature plastics-free!
Learn more → https://t.co/43RMH8jiax https://t.co/XlSzEgH4Ky

data.text:
President @JunckerEU this week at the Brussels Economic Forum:
"Our single currency, the euro, unites not only economies, but also the people of Europe." #EUBEF18
https://t.co/9BYPI1RtvN

How can we involve more stakeholders and citizens when public authorities launch new projects in cities around Europe?
#EUHaveYourSay via our questionnaire on Strategic Environmental Assessment: https://t.co/AYEYD2dIdr

Is your project turning the Sustainable Development Goals into concrete solutions? Check out the #EUSustainabilityAward we've launched this week! 
Apply today to win: https://t.co/P3zL0eNe4c  #SDGs https://t.co/lxJ2VE1jZ9

Odilo is a start-up from Cartagena, Spain, providing digital content and promoting e-reading with the help of EU funds. They gave 13 graduates from the city’s Polytechnic University their first jobs https://t.co/qY2QfvEwhM #investEU #DiaDeMurcia https://t.co/8liLADZwlJ

Customs officers test imported goods in 90 specialised customs  laboratories across the EU.
They make sure products are safe. 🇪🇺
https://t.co/YnmaX6YGGF #CustomsUnion #50CU https://t.co/kSi6KJLx4Y

The founding fathers knew that they were going to change history. 
They knew that history lives through archives. 
For greater transparency, our archives are made public after 30 years. #IAD18 https://t.co/mjOVM5Q3Tx

Today is International Archives Day!
Our archives service, created in 1983, takes care of more than 60 years of European history. We should remember the past to build a better future. #IAD18 https://t.co/6ZAsewZgxB
Kick-off of #G7Charlevoix with coordination meeting of European leaders. #EuropeUnited https://t.co/CgOz4MeitD

data.text: 🔴 Follow live press conference by @JunckerEU and @eucopresident on the EU participation at the #G7Charlevoix → https://t.co/brjnsvrpky https://t.co/CF0xaZwzCS

"Le Royaume-Uni a décidé de quitter l'Union. Il doit en assumer les conséquences. Si nous voulons construire une nouvelle relation, il faut plus de réalisme sur ce qui est possible et ce qui ne l'est pas." @MichelBarnier #Article50 #Brexit https://t.co/sG0kFtSy5l

Berlin-based Magforce develped a new way to fight brain tumours using nanoparticles. More than 90 patients have already undergone NanoTherm therapy. With help from EU, such innovations promise a better future to patients. https://t.co/ulXtiByZbJ #WorldBrainTumourDay #InvestEU https://t.co/SPEcUh9nEu

It is vital to work together in building a more cyber secure European Union and avoid the complication of different national laws. We are pleased that the @EUCouncil adopted today a general approach on the #Cybersecurity Act → https://t.co/UjIaZdV5cT https://t.co/l6yLKmC1kw

We want to protect citizens from dangerous goods entering the Union.
For more information: 
→ #CustomsUnion press release https://t.co/FscuwVmibR
→ Memo https://t.co/rB7cqCaBWw
→ Factsheets https://t.co/piA4LyLzoO
→ Follow @EU_Taxud https://t.co/NahVdSsqyi

The new Fiscalis Programme will
📲 Put in place more connected and interoperable IT systems
🖇️ Support the exchange of best practices and training
🧮 Put in place joint actions
📈 Foster the EU competitiveness
Learn more → https://t.co/FscuwVmibR https://t.co/ieWWoePq1Q

The new #CustomsUnion Programme will
📨 Increase information and data exchange
👮‍♂️ Support customs authorities in protecting the EU interests 
🛡️ Help the EU better respond to security threats 
💼 Facilitate growing levels of trade
Learn more → https://t.co/FscuwVmibR https://t.co/szeO1YB5YC

The new Customs Programme will put in place a modern #CustomsUnion with EU business and citizens at its heart, while the Fiscalis Programme will support cooperation between EU countries' tax administrations
Learn more → https://t.co/FscuwVmibR https://t.co/DkChpGkkgj

"Our new Customs and Fiscalis programmes will boost cooperation between national authorities. It will help the EU to progress in offering businesses unfettered and easy access to the EU's Single Market" #CustomsUnion https://t.co/bBubZH61m6

We believe in open and fair trade but we are not naïve free traders.
Today, our new #EUtrade defence rules become effective. They modernise anti-dumping and anti-subsidy rules and shorten the investigation period.  
Learn more → https://t.co/5AvZCgQfKl https://t.co/5VusBbKnd3

Plastics are the most widely-used packaging material covering 37% of the food in the EU. But that is about to change with EU-funded EcoBioCap – packaging made from 100% biodegradable agri-food industry waste. https://t.co/e6xcZ5Sl78 #WorldOceansDay #PlasticsStrategy #InvestEU https://t.co/GwhO5HCYFR

Today is #WorldOceansDay!
Billions of people depend on the ocean for livelihood, trade and prosperity.
Yet, more than 150 million tonnes of plastics have accumulated in the world's ocean. Together, we can reduce marine litter by 30% by 2020. #OurOcean https://t.co/JXKZjPbhDH

Clean air should be a right for all, not a luxury! 
Help us assess how the EU laws have contributed to #CleanAirEU and let us know if you believe the laws are still fit for purpose → https://t.co/bAPHBpjNZP #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/hmglVSLdr4

On 15 June, we will discuss the future of #BetterRegulation with First VP @TimmermansEU. Join the Second Annual Conference on Regulatory Scrutiny in the EU. 
Full programme and registrations → https://t.co/pFL6LdHvJv https://t.co/pYvMDMrfG6

In the 25 years of its existence, the #SingleMarket has brought enormous benefits to EU citizens and businesses.
For more information: 
→ #SingleMarket press release https://t.co/SrUtJpKDI9
→ Factsheet https://t.co/UyOy5K5wU8
→ Follow @EU_Growth https://t.co/Bteg8gOjIU

Our new #SingleMarket Programme will support:
🛒 Consumer protection
📊 Competitiveness
👩‍⚕️ Human, animal and plant health
⚙️ First class standards
💻 Fair competition in the digital age
Learn more → https://t.co/SrUtJpKDI9 https://t.co/Y1wTZ1xhDx
“The #SingleMarket is the beating heart of the EU. In the 25 years of its existence it has brought enormous benefits to EU citizens and businesses.” @EBienkowskaEU https://t.co/yCt4Den6Rl

Investing in research and innovation is investing in the #FutureofEurope.
For more information:
→ #HorizonEU press release https://t.co/1NGW6AIzdf
→ Factsheet https://t.co/d7d6pUxzBb
→ Webpage https://t.co/oNnjGYx6De
→ Follow @EU_H2020, @EUScienceInnov, @EU_ScienceHub https://t.co/Ru2pZWrhNG

We support research in areas delivering incredible results. 
#HorizonEU research contributed to 
 🏥 Improving cancer treatment and chemotherapy
 ✈️ Producing ‘solar’ jet fuel from water and carbon dioxide 
🔋 Developing a super battery
Learn more → https://t.co/1NGW6AIzdf https://t.co/Pg7nBCyMBW

Our #HorizonEU will include:
🏢 European Innovation Council for fast-moving innovations
📋 New EU-wide research missions such as fight against cancer
📚 Support to open access to publications and data
🖇️ Operational links with #CohesionPolicy, #DigitalEurope, #ConnectingEurope https://t.co/9ZKaT8J99F

We want to keep the EU at the forefront of global research and innovation.
We propose to create #HorizonEU – the most ambitious research and innovation programme yet with a #EUBudget of €100 billion for 2021-2027. 
Learn more → https://t.co/1NGW6AIzdf https://t.co/0INUMI8G9u
“Our EU research and innovation programme is one of Europe's biggest success stories. The new #HorizonEU programme aims even higher”. @jyrkikatainen and @Moedas #EUBudget https://t.co/SyPFgbArXb

@TheFlash1963 Dear  @TheFlash1963, with this consultation we aim at gathering evidence on the scale of this problem and the effectiveness of the measures so far. Your views will feed into our next proposals to tackle illegal content online.
Best, the #EUHaveYourSay Team

@DavidCoburnUKip Hi @DavidCoburnUKip @keeptalkingGR @RozsaNiki. We refer to dissemination of terrorist content or hate speech, child sexual abuse material, illegal commercial practices, infringements of intellectual property rights, selling of illicit drugs, counterfeits or other illicit goods.

Our curiosity-driven @ERC_Research has contributed to some of the greatest recent discoveries
🧠 Artificial synapse
✴ Sleepy bacteria resisting to antibiotics
📀 Hardware vulnerabilities
🌔 Seven potentially inhabitable planets
Learn more → https://t.co/5lkcR8dk0e #HorizonEU https://t.co/zzW4GSKa6a

Do you know what it takes to launch a European Citizens’ Initiative? Learn everything in our webinar and get advice from those who have successfully presented their initiatives.
Register now → https://t.co/BvneKLJGWh  #EUTakeTheInitiative #ECI https://t.co/pnhHvTdu7p

We support daring ideas to explore the frontiers of knowledge. 
Horizon Europe, with a budget of €97.9 billion, will be the biggest ever research and innovation funding programme. 
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on #HorizonEU. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/Ru8TlzfKQo

We supported Prof. Svante Pääbo in his research on Neanderthal genome sequencing with a @ERC_Research grant. 
He has just been bestowed with the 2018 #PrincessAsturiasAwards for Technical and Scientific Research. 
Congratulations 👏 https://t.co/9Ao964BigU

Our first ever Digital Europe programme will reinforce Europe's strategic digital capacities. For more information
→ #DigitalEurope press release https://t.co/2QoDPZAuap
→ Factsheet https://t.co/I5fGIlZ5EZ
→ Follow @DSMeu https://t.co/GLoDE4o4ld

Digital transformation holds the key to unlocking future growth in Europe. 
We will invest in key strategic digital capacities and European citizens will stay at the heart of our new #DigitalEurope programme.
Learn more → https://t.co/2QoDPZAuap https://t.co/OFJOT8nvzf

We propose to create the first ever #DigitalEurope programme and invest €9.2 billion from our next long-term #EUBudget in
🖥️ High Performance Computing
🧠 #ArtificialIntelligence 
🛡️ #CyberSecurity 
🎓 Advanced #DigitalSkills
Learn more → https://t.co/2QoDPZAuap https://t.co/pPvczNY0gU
Digital transformation holds the key to unlocking future growth in Europe. #DigitalEurope #EUBudget proposal with @GabrielMariya #DigitalSingleMarket https://t.co/uY6SItJckt

For more info:
→ #InvestEU Press release https://t.co/zCu8Lf4N7f
→ #EUSpace Press release https://t.co/pYlih1rLOI
→ #ConnectingEurope Press release https://t.co/4DdgueDXah
→ Factsheets https://t.co/I5fGIlZ5EZ
→ Follow @ecfin, @EU_Growth, @Energy4Europe, @Transport_EU, @DSMeu https://t.co/pdmF93Jkzl

Our #EUSpace programme will 
🚀 maintain autonomous and cost-effective access to space
🔭 improve access for space start-ups to finance
🛰️ create innovation partnerships
🔬 ensure collaboration between space-related research and #HorizonEU
Learn more → https://t.co/pYlih1rLOI https://t.co/T0Rt0AVwel

Space matters for Europe. 
Over 10% of the EU's GDP is already dependent on space-related services.
We are proposing to devote €16 billion of our #EUBudget to help maintain and further enhance the EU's leadership in #EUSpace. 
Learn more → https://t.co/pYlih1rLOI https://t.co/OMVDznP76L

This #EUBudget proposal will build the infrastructure needed for the clean energy transition and help achieve our ambitious 2030 climate and energy targets.
More on the new #ConnectingEurope Facility → https://t.co/4DdgueDXah https://t.co/q5TEzFohpT

data.text:
How to apply for funding under the #InvestEU programme, starting 2021?
→ SMEs should apply through local banks
→ Bigger projects can apply directly to @EIB, @EBRD, @WorldBank or Council of Europe Bank
Learn more → https://t.co/G5avOCgW5a #EUBudget https://t.co/Rsg8zPpB3T

Under our next #EUBudget, #InvestEU will create and support jobs throughout the EU in 4 areas:
🌿 Sustainable infrastructure
🔬 Research, innovation and digitisation
💼 SMEs
🎓 Social investment and skills
Learn more → https://t.co/G5avOCgW5a https://t.co/x0Kfen26DH

The #InvestEU programme in a nutshell:
💶 Funding: InvestEU Fund to mobilise €650 billion of financing in 2021-2027
👩‍🏫 Advising: InvestEU Advisory Hub to integrate 13 different advisory services
🤝 Matchmaking: InvestEU Portal 
Learn more → https://t.co/zCu8Lf4N7f  #EUbudget https://t.co/GQu2gkLtTW

We are making life easier for European companies.
The #InvestEU Fund will bring multiple EU financial programmes under one roof to simplify the procedure to access financing 
Learn more → https://t.co/zCu8Lf4N7f #EUbudget https://t.co/hcYvxo6MoG

We present our #EUBudget proposals on #InvestEU programme, #EUSpace, and the #ConnectingEurope Facility.
@MarosSefcovic @jyrkikatainen @Bulc_EU @EBienkowskaEU https://t.co/qsmLda88zd

@DordeStojkovic .@DordeStojkovic, we have recently banned the outdoor use of three neonicotinoid pesticides to protect bees. The EU Pollinators Initiative will strengthen the current risk assessment of pesticides on pollinators and restrict substances for which harmful impacts are demonstrated.

The EU's largest lake in Sweden hosts a wind farm providing clean energy to 40,000 people while also creating jobs. We move towards #CleanEnergyEU! https://t.co/cQ46qFlw3X 
#InvestEU #EUSEW2018 #SverigesNationaldag https://t.co/TIJFmpOpia

Supercomputing, Artificial Intelligence, Skills: our new Digital Europe programme will shape Europe's digital transformation to the benefit of citizens and businesses.
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on Digital Europe. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/aKs67YOZ4u

Triggering almost €290 billion in investment, the Investment Plan for Europe has proven a success when it comes to mobilising private investment and creating jobs in Europe. 
Today, we will present our #EUBudget proposals on the future of #investEU. Outline explained ↓ https://t.co/MrC8cKm6Ux

Happy National Day, Sweden! 🇸🇪🎉 Sveriges nationaldag!
#Sweden has been part of the EU family since January 1995 🇪🇺 #SverigesNationalDag https://t.co/crodn1OWWA

We want to beat plastic pollution. 
And you, are you #ReadyToChange?
On #WorldEnvironmentDay, we invite you to join our effort to reduce single-use plastics and help make our oceans and nature plastics-free!
Learn more → https://t.co/43RMH8jiax #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/L58MmDiPLX

We welcome the decision by @EUCouncil to strengthen @Europol's cooperation with third countries. We need to give Europol the right tools and resources to protect Europeans, including exchange of key information with our neighbours → https://t.co/GADNLcuvmE #SecurityUnion https://t.co/i54tp9NqlZ

We launch the first ever #EUSustainabilityAward to reward inspiring initiatives turning the Sustainable Development Goals into concrete solutions. 
Are you one of them? Find out how to enter the competition: https://t.co/P3zL0eNe4c #SDGs https://t.co/IH5fk3x8MR

The European Development Days kick off today!
This year we focus on women and girls at the forefront of sustainable development.
Follow @europeaid for more!
https://t.co/QSq7RYQKfW #EDD18 #SheisWe https://t.co/Je9z547Gqi

Happy Constitution Day, Denmark!
God #Grundlovsdag, Danmark! 
Denmark has been part of the EU family since January 1973 🇩🇰🇪🇺 #5juni https://t.co/y8jbED2MP0

data.text:
Nos drapeaux sont en berne en solidarité avec #Liège. 
Le President @JunckerEU s'est dit profondément choqué par l'attaque et a rendu un hommage appuyé au travail admirable des policiers belges qui ont perdu deux des leurs. https://t.co/ccSJmkxx2H

📌 Check out the #TeamJunckerEU calendar for the week including Brussels Economic Forum #EUBEF18, European Development Days #EDD18, and Sustainable Energy Week #EUSEW → https://t.co/HYpXWJVhAx https://t.co/bhmaShYAF8

On Tuesday, we will open the Brussels Economic Forum with these questions in mind:
👾 What is the future of work in a #DigitalEconomy?
👾 What future for the Economic and Monetary Union? 
👾 What financial system?
See our programme → https://t.co/B3nS2WmkOq #EUBEF18 https://t.co/G30rG2NO4h

We want your views on illegal content online:
• Have you ever come across it?
• Who plays a major role to fight its spread?
• How can we make the internet a safer place while safeguarding freedom of expression?
#EUHaveYourSay in our survey → https://t.co/aaSkPxhbW2 https://t.co/YzrJpi2ynP

Lost or stolen passports make up more than 60% of the cases of consular assistance.
The new security features we propose for emergency travel documents will prevent criminals from counterfeiting or using them for criminal activities.
https://t.co/GSWIPSX5Py #ConsularProtection https://t.co/9uLm8wzLAk

1 in 10 pollinating insects is on the verge of extinction.
A third of bee and butterfly species is declining.
We want to protect pollinators, raise awareness, and promote collaboration. 🐝 https://t.co/GiweOueCq3 #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/ddIiXiJIc7

Thanks to the #CustomsUnion and #SingleMarket there are no more regular customs checks of luggage at internal borders of the EU. 
https://t.co/YnmaX6YGGF #50CU https://t.co/QyMdytOSa5

Plastic waste is choking our oceans, killing wildlife and threatening our own health. We are targeting the most found plastic waste items on Europe's beaches.
Learn more → https://t.co/Uyqr74Z3Vv  #PlasticsStrategy #CircularEconomy https://t.co/bmE8pEAPcg

He believed in the power of accessing finance. He changed the lives of millions of women and families. He is Muhammad Yunus, 2006 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate.
Learn more → https://t.co/iqLMB2EykN #SheisWe #EDD18 https://t.co/ONiPgn20ZV

Today is #WorldBicycleDay🚲!
With a little help from EU, Swedish company Hövding created an airbag for cyclists that deploys within 0.1 seconds of a collision and absorbs 3 times more impact. https://t.co/c9ls3s9ts6 #InvestEU https://t.co/zTnFthp857

On Tuesday, we will open our EU Sustainable Energy Week in Brussels with several Energy Days happening throughout all EU countries in June. If your work supports an economy built on clean, secure, efficient energy, #EUSEW18 is for you! → https://t.co/kyFPugXZD1  #CleanEnergyEU https://t.co/AoGN41JF4z
